title: Today's Syrian Election Shows The Extent Of Assad's Power
content:
1. Today's Syrian Election Shows The Extent Of Assad's Power  NPR
  2. Syria's sham election guarantees 1 thing — Bashar Assad will win | DW News  DW News
  3. ‘Mob boss’ Assad’s dynasty tightens grip over husk of Syria  The Guardian
  4. Today I saw Syrians dancing and celebrating life, and a return to peace – but, of course, the Western media won’t report that  RT
  5. Syrians vote in 'non-event' presidential election set to be won by Assad  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
